title: Geographical RoI (Region of Interest)
---

## the chosen geographical region of interest

1. choosing the region of interest
    1. why this region is interesting
    2. why this region is good in terms of data sampling
        1. is this region evenly sampled?
2. choosing the ES(n) indicator
    1. how does ES(n) compare to Shan/Simpson/etc
    2. what ES-number is best
    3. what spatial granularity is best
    4. what temporal granularity is best
3. findings in this area
    1. biodiversity change over time
    2. how biodiveristy hotspots correlate with
        1. habitat maps
        2. temperature, NDVI, chlorophyll, other sat products
4. relevant takeaways for resource managers
